001package gbw.melange.common.elementary.space;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable;
006import gbw.melange.common.annotations.View;
007import gbw.melange.common.builders.ISpaceBuilder;
008import gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.*;
009import gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementBuilder;
010
011/**
012 * A given ISpace may represent an area within which all assigned element's constraints must be resolved. <br/>
013 * It is a way to limit cascading events, and to let elements be dynamically sized and positioned efficiently. <br/>
014 *
015 * @author GustavBW
016 * @version $Id: $Id
017 */
018public interface ISpace extends Disposable {
019
020    /**
021     * If hidden, reveal this space.
022     * This method overrides {@link View#focusPolicy()}.
023     */
024    void show();
025    /**
026     * If visible, hide this space.
027     * This method overrides {@link View#focusPolicy()}.
028     */
029    void hide();
030
031    void render();
032    void onResize(int w, int h);
033
034    /**
035     * Apply supplied matrix to space and all its elements.
036     */
037    void render(Matrix4 parentMatrix);
038    void resolveConstraints();
039    void resolveConstraints(IConstrainedElement cascadeRoot);
040
041    /**
042     * Create a new element belonging to this Space.
043     */
044    IElementBuilder<?> createElement();
045
046    /**
047     * Creates a new {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.ISpacerElement} that represents empty space.
048     */
049    ISpaceBuilder createSpace();
050    /**
051     * Manual addition method for {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.ISpacerElement}
052     */
053    void addSpace(ISpacerElement spacer);
054
055    /**
056     * Manual version of {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.space.ISpace#createElement}
057     */
058    <T> void addPureElement(IPureElement<T> element);
059    /**
060     * Manual version of {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.space.ISpace#createElement()}
061     */
062    <T> void addLoadingElement(ILoadingElement<T> element);
063
064}
